items.title: Update: Environmental and Health Advisory Has Been Lifted
items.summary: UPDATE: As of April 14, 2022 at 3:30pm, the public health advisory for Bell Creek and Canon Creek has been lifted.  The County and its partnering agencies have sampled the impacted areas and have not identified any significant impacts. N...

items.title: Napa County Hosts Public Health Fair with 30+ Participating Organizations
items.summary: In honor of Public Health Week, Napa County Health and Human Services Agency invites the public to attend a free Public Health and Community Resource Fair in Fuller Park on Sunday, April 10. The annual event is retur...
